ValidationRule.description: Checks if start date is future date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Activity', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Short_Course', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Unit', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Module' ), ISPICKVAL( ProductRequestID__r.Product_Request_Status__c , 'Design'), OR(Start_Date__c < TODAY(), Start_Date__c == TODAY()) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Start Date must be a Future Date
